name: Motus GI Holdings, Inc.
description: Motus GI Holdings, Inc. is a medical technology company focused on improving the standard of care in gastrointestinal procedures. Founded in 2014, Motus GI develops innovative solutions that enhance the performance and efficiency of colonoscopy procedures. The company's flagship product, the Pure-Vu System, is designed to help physicians optimize the visualization of the colon during colonoscopy by clearing stool and debris. This technology aims to reduce the need for repeat procedures, improve patient outcomes, and increase the overall efficiency of colonoscopy practices. The Pure-Vu System has received FDA clearance and is making strides in the clinical setting, providing a much-needed solution to common challenges faced during routine colonoscopies. Motus GI is committed to advancing gastrointestinal healthcare through technological innovation, collaborating closely with healthcare professionals to ensure its products meet the evolving needs of the medical community. As the prevalence of colorectal cancer continues to rise, the importance of effective screening and diagnostic tools is paramount, and Motus GI is at the forefront of this critical aspect of healthcare.
